mapper.select: SELECT a.a_nick, COUNT(ct.a_no) AS solved, si.a_programmers, si.a_level, si.a_git, si.s_a_regdate FROM study_in si JOIN account a ON si.a_no = a.a_no LEFT JOIN coding_test ct ON si.a_no = ct.a_no WHERE si.s_no = (SELECT s_no FROM study_in WHERE a_no = #{a_no}) AND si.r_ok = '1' GROUP BY a.a_nick, si.a_programmers, si.a_level, si.a_git, si.s_a_regdate ORDER BY s_a_regdate;
